text: Reginald Bernie Lewis (January 23, 1936 â€“ February 11, 2021) was an American bodybuilder and actor. Lewis was born in Niles, California. He was in the television gameshow You Bet Your Life, with Groucho Marx. In the 1970s, Lewis appeared in many movies such as in Mae West's Sextette in 1978. Lewis died in California on February 11, 2021 in Los Angeles at the age of 85.Reg Lewis, Actor and Mae West Muscleman, Dies at 85 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American bodybuilders Category:Actors from Alameda County, California Category:People from Fremont, California
title: Reg Lewis (bodybuilder)
